abstract.t: This document provides a survey of HTTP/2 [I-D.ietf-httpbis-http2] and HPACK [I-D.ietf-httpbis-header-compression] implementations and interoperability tests based on HTTP/2.0 Testing [I-D.trace-httpbis-http2-test]. Goals of this document are to help improving HTTP/2 specifications and HTTP/2 implementions and deployments.
